title: That Prankster Girl
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>….or so happened<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu. Kasumi-san did that kind of thing again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. I saw it clearly. Rina-chan board 「Wide Open」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>The other day too, Kasumi-san was trying to prank our training shoes, but then she said “It’s dirty!”, then gave them a wash<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah…., I noticed that my shoes were suddenly prettier, I thought I imagined it….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>That’s right. She washed and dried them, or so she accidentally said to me with a satisfied look, then she desperately tried to hide the shoes so I can’t help but laugh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I can picture that…. Rina-chan board 「Imagining」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu. Sounds just like Kasumi-san, doesn’t it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. Rather, it makes me want to help her with her mischief….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
